title: Platonik: Mavi Dolunay Otel
overview: A modest boutique hotel run by a mother and her two daughters in Alaçatı becomes highly desirable to investors due to its location. A handsome businessman is determined to buy the hotel that the mother absolutely does not want to sell. He decides to stay there under a false name and as soon as he checks in, he makes both daughters fall in love with him. One believes she has found her soulmate sent by the universe, while the other is convinced that he is her destiny….
